00015

00017

00042    int incy = 1;

00199 double Matrix::trace(){

00202 
00203    for(int i = 0;i < n;++i)
00204       ward += matrix[i][i];

00216 void Matrix::diagonalize(double *eigenvalues){
00217 
00218    char jobz = 'V';
00219    char uplo = 'U';
00220 
00221    int lwork = 3*n - 1;
00222 
00223    double *work = new double [lwork];
00224 
00225    int info;
00226 
00227    dsyev_(&jobz,&uplo,&n,matrix[0],&n,eigenvalues,work,&lwork,&info);
00228 
00229    delete [] work;
00230 
00231 }

00237 double Matrix::ddot(Matrix &matrix_i){

00239    int dim = n*n;
00240    int inc = 1;
00241 
00242    return ddot_(&dim,matrix[0],&inc,matrix_i.matrix[0],&inc);

00249 void Matrix::invert(){
00250 
00251    char uplo = 'U';
00252 
00253    int INFO;
00254 
00255    dpotrf_(&uplo,&n,matrix[0],&n,&INFO);//cholesky decompositie
00256 
00257    dpotri_(&uplo,&n,matrix[0],&n,&INFO);//inverse berekenen
00258 
00259    //terug symmetrisch maken:
00260    this->symmetrize();
00261 
00262 }

00280 void Matrix::fill_Random(){
00281 
00282    srand(time(NULL));
00283 
00284    for(int i = 0;i < n;++i)
00285       for(int j = i;j < n;++j)
00286          matrix[j][i] = (double) rand()/RAND_MAX;
00287 
00288    for(int i = 0;i < n;++i)
00289       for(int j = i + 1;j < n;++j)
00290          matrix[i][j] = matrix[j][i];
00291 
00292 }

00298 void Matrix::sqrt(int option){
00299 
00300    Matrix hulp(*this);
00301 
00302    double *eigen = new double [n];
00303 
00304    hulp.diagonalize(eigen);
00305 
00306    if(option == 1)
00307       for(int i = 0;i < n;++i)
00308          eigen[i] = std::sqrt(eigen[i]);
00309    else
00310       for(int i = 0;i < n;++i)
00311          eigen[i] = 1.0/std::sqrt(eigen[i]);
00312 
00313    //hulp opslaan
00314    Matrix hulp_c = hulp;
00315 
00316    //vermenigvuldigen met diagonaalmatrix
00317    hulp_c.mdiag(eigen);
00318 
00319    //en tenslotte de laatste matrixvermenigvuldiging
00320    char transA = 'N';
00321    char transB = 'T';
00322 
00323    double alpha = 1.0;
00324    double beta = 0.0;
00325 
00326    dgemm_(&transA,&transB,&n,&n,&n,&alpha,hulp_c.matrix[0],&n,hulp.matrix[0],&n,&beta,matrix[0],&n);
00327 
00328    delete [] eigen;
00329 
00330 }

00336 void Matrix::mdiag(double *diag){
00337 
00338    int inc = 1;
00339 
00340    for(int i = 0;i < n;++i)
00341       dscal_(&n,diag + i,matrix[i],&inc);

00343 }

00351 void Matrix::L_map(Matrix &map,Matrix &object){
00352    
00353    char side = 'L';
00354    char uplo = 'U';
00355 
00356    double alpha = 1.0;
00357    double beta = 0.0;
00358 
00359    double *hulp = new double [n*n];
00360 
00361    dsymm_(&side,&uplo,&n,&n,&alpha,map.matrix[0],&n,object.matrix[0],&n,&beta,hulp,&n);
00362 
00363    side = 'R';
00364 
00365    dsymm_(&side,&uplo,&n,&n,&alpha,map.matrix[0],&n,hulp,&n,&beta,matrix[0],&n);
00366 
00367    delete [] hulp;
00368 
00369    //expliciet symmetriseren van de uit matrix
00370    this->symmetrize();
00371 
00372 }

00379 Matrix &Matrix::mprod(Matrix &A, Matrix &B){
00380 
00381    char trans = 'N';
00382 
00383    double alpha = 1.0;
00384    double beta = 0.0;
00385 
00386    dgemm_(&trans,&trans,&n,&n,&n,&alpha,A.matrix[0],&n,B.matrix[0],&n,&beta,matrix[0],&n);
00387 
00388    return *this;
00389 
00390 }

00395 void Matrix::symmetrize(){
00396 
00397    for(int i = 0;i < n;++i)
00398       for(int j = i + 1;j < n;++j)
00399          matrix[i][j] = matrix[j][i];
00400 
00401 }

00403 ostream &operator<<(ostream &output,Matrix &matrix_p){
00404 
00405    for(int i = 0;i < matrix_p.gn();++i)
00406       for(int j = 0;j < matrix_p.gn();++j)
00407          output << i << "\t" << j << "\t" << matrix_p(i,j) << endl;
00408 
00409    return output;
00410 
00411 }
